reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very healthy and great iron supplement. Easy to swallow, no taste, and no stomach upset. My iron has stayed stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gentle Iron Boost Rooted in Goodness
reviews.reviewText: Just hopped on the MegaFood Blood Builder train, and let me tell you, it's a game-changer for anyone needing an iron boost without the drama.These ain't your regular iron tablets – clinically shown to increase iron levels without messing with your vibe. No side effects, just results. MegaFood knows how to do it right.And it's not just iron – they've thrown in vitamin C and beet root for that extra nutrient punch. It's like a powerhouse for your health. Folic acid and vitamin B12 jump in for the ride, ensuring your red blood cells are doing their happy dance.The real deal here is that MegaFood believes in the power of nature. Real food and added nutrients – that's the secret sauce in these premium supplements. They're not just about making a product; they're about creating a wellness experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to get Iron and Vit B12 from healthy foods!
reviews.reviewText: Definitely a great way to get iron as well as B12 vitamins! There is a bit of an aftertaste if you let it sit on your tongue too long and the pills are about 1.5cm long and 0.5cm wide, so be aware they can be harder to swallow for some people, but they are super easy to break into two halves if need be for ease of swallowing. Seem to work great and like that they derive their vitamins from foods. Gentle on your stomach as well! Will be buying again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not enough iron
reviews.reviewText: While this is not constipating as it states, it only has 26 mg of iron and my doctor says the recommended daily dosage should be 65 mg. It is definitely non constipating. It did boost my energy a little. I just wish that it had more iron

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good product. Helped improve my iron level. Only downside is the metal taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Recommended by a friend. Great product. Feeling more energized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No stomach issues
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the Iron supplements I purchased, they do not bother my stomach if I take them on an empty stomach. The size of the pill is also small and easy to swallow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great news - From 'Rejected' to => 'Accepted'!
reviews.reviewText: Short version: I was able to go from 'rejected' to 'accepted' - at the local blood bank (able to donate healthy blood again!).Longer version: To clarify, I am 60+ YO, above average health, active compared to others in my age range, and had an accident requiring a couple hours of surgery earlier in the year. After recovery, on my next planned blood donation appointment, I was found to be iron deficient and 'REJECTED' from being able to donate blood at that time. I've since learned a lot about how the combination of aging (no matter how healthy), routine blood donations and blood loss during surgeries can affect the bodies ability to rebuild blood.The ONLY change I made to my diet was the addition of this supplement ... after ~10 weeks, and going in for my next planned donation ... I showed a marked improvement in my blood iron content, allowing me to begin donating blood again. I was 'ACCEPTED'.Obviously, as I'm tested at each blood donation, I will continue to monitor to see if there's any other health-related changes I need to make.In closing, I'm incredibly grateful for this supplement - helping improve my overall health, which allows me to contribute to the blood donation needs of my local community (it's important to me).Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: It helps me to have good quality sleep
reviews.reviewText: I have been struggling to have a good quality sleep for quite a white due to stress, new environment and etc, and I've researched that Iron is a big factor on that, so I looked for an organic good quality iron that doesn't taste like rust, or give me stomach disruptions. THIS ONE WAS THE BEST, plus it has food add ons.
